description:
This course will show you how to create flat designs on Inkscape.

Inkscape is a free vector graphics editor. You can use it to create and edit different kinds of vector graphics like logos and illustrations.

The first section is an introduction to Inkscape. I will show you different kinds of shapes and the tools that I use to create the shapes.

The second section will have various vector art design examples. I will show you how to create some flat vector art designs like a calendar, camera, food and drinks.

The third section is about exporting. I will show you how to export the vector art design and put the design as a Facebook page cover.

You can use the skills you learned in this course to create your own flat vector art designs. You can put the designs on social media sites like your Facebook page or your Youtube channel. You can also create vector art designs for other people.
title: Create Flat Designs with Inkscape
